fields.name: Stop-In Effect:
fields.value:
- If not the owner, Warp **directly** to a random tile in the board and **Interact** with it.
- For the rest of this current turn if you gain money, half of it goes to the owner, if you lose/give money, you give 50% of what you lost/gave to the owner instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Loses ownership after it is activated 3 times.
